After temperatures inside apartments there reached as high as 92 degrees last week, a judge ordered Davis to install window air-conditioners in the building. description_link: Bill Rancic, winner of the first season of “The Apprentice” and his wife, entertainment news personality Giuliana Rancic, are selling their Gold Cost Victorian townhouse. And they’re looking to turn a hefty profit after extensive renovations on the 130-year-old home.
loc: 105 E Bellevue Pl, Chicago, IL 60611, USA

HED: A group of investors are taking over the landmark Delaware Building
DEK: Led by attorney Steven DeGraff, the new owners could redevelop the property for co-working or housing
description_link: An investment group has taken control of the landmark Delaware Building nearly three years after filing a foreclosure suit against the previous owner, county records show.
loc: 36 W Randolph St, Chicago, IL 60601, USA
